title: Zilean needs some love, i think we should change how his rewind works. +passive ideas
body:
Current:
Rewind	
COST: 35 MANA 
COOLDOWN: 14 / 12 / 10 / 8 / 6
ACTIVE: Zilean reduces the cooldowns of Time Bomb and Time Warp by 10 seconds.


With it no longer effecting his ult and his bombs being rather hard to land I think it could use a mini rework. 

New:
Rewind
Range: 800	
COST: 35 MANA 
COOLDOWN: 14 / 12 / 10 / 8 / 6
ACTIVE: Zilean's next Time Bomb or Time warp triggers no cooldown. Increases the cooldowns of nearby enemies by 1s.
Passive: Zilean gains health regen equal to 20/40/60/80/100% of his mana regeneration.

New:
Rewind
Range: 800	
COST: 35 MANA 
COOLDOWN: 14 / 12 / 10 / 8 / 6
ACTIVE: Forces target enemy back in time 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.
(they get blinked back to where they came from)



**Also how would you feel about changing his passive?**

Current:
Heightened Learning	
RANGE: 1500
Increases experience gain of all allied champions within Heightened Learning's range by 8%.

New:
Heightened Learning
Range: 800
Zilean bends time reducing the speed of harmful projectiles by 30%.

New:
Heightened Learning
Zilean gains CDR based on his bonus mana or ap.

New:
Time Stop
Range: 700
When Zilean drops below 30% health he stuns nearby enemies for 1s. 
180 second cooldown.

New:
Time dilation
Range: 1000
Every time zilean casts a spell, he gains a stack of time dilation, stacking up to Y times(lasts X seconds.)
Zilean and his allies gain x/y/z % CDR while enemies lose the same amount.

replies.body:
I've been maining Zilean after his rework, and I believe his rewind is perfectly fine. It's really just his passive and his bombs that keep him from being a major contender. 

The first thing players need to know is that his bombs are no longer what makes Zilean a good pick. People need to realize his true strength is getting people to and from places with his 99% haste/slow on a 3 second cooldown(with max CDR).

I rarely put more points into his bombs after level 1 because his damage isn't reliable or even very good. Instead I max everything else. Q W Q is dead and doesn't work. Don't even waste the mana trying. E Q W Q works wonders. Perma slow and stuns.
